div.p: The mission of the Gillett School District is to offer students a high quality educational experience in a secure learning environment which recognizes, values and responds to student's individual needs.

p.span: We have been fielding questions from Secondary School families regarding pickup of personal items/locker clean out. A letter will be sent...
Students in 8th grade Civic class continue to #inspire2serve ! Way to go Tigers! 🐾♥️
Way to go HIQ coaches and team! Way to represent GSD.
